update_every.title: Update frequency
update_every.description: The frequency, in seconds, at which a set number of ping packets (specified by 'packets') are sent to the specified hosts.

privileged.title: Privileged mode
privileged.description: Determines the type of ping packets. If unset, sends unprivileged UDP ping packets; if set, sends raw ICMP ping packets (requires elevated privileges).

hosts.title: Network hosts
hosts.description: List of network hosts (IP addresses or domain names) to send ping packets.

network.title: Network
network.description: Determines the type of network resolution to use for the specified hosts. Choose one of the following options: 'ip' (selects IPv4 or IPv6 based on system configuration), 'ipv4' (forces resolution to IPv4 addresses), 'ipv6' (forces resolution to IPv6 addresses).

packets.title: Packets
packets.description: Number of ping packets to send for each host.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: Timeout between sending ping packets, in seconds.

interval.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
